title: populate
explanation: Creates [number] of questions numbered 1 - [number] with an reaction emoji for letters A-E.

title: search
explanation: Searches the complete game list for the specified game(s) you wish to find. You can search for multiple games at once, simply seperate by a comma.

title: signUp
explanation: Signs you up to be summoned when someone pings any of the [games] in your games list. You can either write the full game title or the associated number.

title: myGames
explanation: Shows your games list, you will get notifed if anyone pings a game on your games list.

title: removeGame
explanation: Removes [game] from your game list. [game] can be number or the complete title of the game.

title: excludePing
explanation: Sets whether you wish to be @mentioned when someone pings a game to play. If set to 'true', you will be excluded from all pings.

title: excludeDM
explanation: Sets whether you wish to receive a direct message when someone pings a game to play. If set to 'true', you will be excluded from all DM's.

title: help
explanation: Shows the general help screen.

title: helpGames
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving game functionalities.

title: helpStats
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving stats functionalities.

title: helpMiscellaneous
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving miscellaneous functionalities.

title: helpMusic
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving music functionalities.

title: STUDY
explanation: ????? [Number of results], [Number of minimum matches], [Number of minimum unique matches]

title: ping
explanation: Pings and DM's every member from the called server who have [game] in their games list. Also starts a squad for the game, default size of 5, can be modified by passing a number after the game title with a ','.

title: initialiseUsers
explanation: Legacy command, checks every user in the server for existing the the database, no need to run it anymore.

title: delete
explanation: Deletes [number] of the last messages. You and the bot must have the *Manage_Messages* permission in the channel you wish to run the command. Can optionally provide a true/false after the number to indicate for the bot to delete only its own messages

title: myStats
explanation: Shows you all of your stats.

title: allStats
explanation: Shows the stats for every user in the server. Can only be called by the server *Administrators*.

title: userStats
explanation: Shows the stats of a specific user who has been mentioned (@user).

title: topStats
explanation: Shows the top stats of this server.

title: play
explanation: Plays a song from a specified URL or search result from youtube. **Supports spotify links as well!**

title: stop
explanation: Empties the queue and makes the bot leave the voice channel.

title: pause
explanation: Pauses the current song.

title: resume
explanation: Resumes playing the current song.

title: skip
explanation: Skips the current song. Or skips a [number] of songs, if provided.

title: gameTutorial
explanation: Starts the game tutorial for you, or reminds of your current step if it is already in progress.

title: suggest
explanation: Send a suggestion to the creator of the bot! All are welcome.
example: 1) suggest *Game xyz is missing from the list, add it!*
2) suggest the bot should be able to do: !

title: updateMe
explanation: If true, you will get a DM whenever a new feature/update/major fix is released!

title: tutorialUpdates
explanation: Configure whether you get notified of a new tutorial release, or an addition/modification to one you have already completed. Setting to true will notify you, false will not.

title: quitTutorial
explanation: Quits any current tutorial.

title: purgeGames
explanation: Removes all the games from your games list.

title: gameStats
explanation: Shows the number of players (and optionally the list of players) signed up for a specific game.

title: topGames
explanation: Shows the top games for the server (by number of players signed up for them). Default length is 5, can be set manually.

title: setServerPrefix
explanation: Sets a custom prefix for this server that only applies to *you*. This prefix has the highest priority.

title: setDefaultPrefix
explanation: Sets a custom prefix that will be used when DM'ing me, or if the there are no other prefixes set.

title: setDefaultServerPrefix
explanation: Sets a custom prefix that is used as the default for this server, useful to avoid prefix conflicts with other bots on the server. You must have the *Administrator* permission.

title: forward
explanation: Forwards a song [number] of seconds. Also works with negative numbers, which will result in a rewind.

title: rewind
explanation: Rewinds a song [number] of seconds or hours:minutes:seconds timestamp. Also works with negative numbers, which will result in a forward.

title: seek
explanation: Starts playing from the provided timestamp in format *Hours:Minutes:Seconds* **OR** *numberOfSeconds*

title: reverse
explanation: Reverses the playlist by 1 song. Or a [number] of songs if provided.

title: addSong
explanation: Adds either the current playing song or one from a provided url/suggestion to one of your existing playlists or makes a new one.

title: createPlaylist
explanation: Creates a new playlist with the provided name - playlists cannot have the same names.

title: myPlayLists
explanation: Shows you all of your playlists by default, if you provide a number or the name of a playlist it will display the specific playlist.

title: removeSong
explanation: Removes a song from a playlist. You can either specify the exact playlist to remove a song from, or use the suggestion prompt.

title: playlist
explanation: Loads one of your playlists into the the queue. If you provide a name of a playlist it will automaticlly be chosen, otherwise a suggestion prompt will appear.

title: savePlayList
explanation: Saves the current playing playlist into one of your playlists.

title: removePlayList
explanation: Removes a specified playlist.

title: q
explanation: Joins an active summon (squad). In the case of multiple active summons, you can specify who to join using an @mention. A number following a comma will notify the others that you will join them in [number] minutes.

title: dq
explanation: Removes you from any active summons you have joined and your own summon (if applicable). If you provide an @mention, it will attempt to leave that player's summon.

title: viewActiveSummons
explanation: Shows all of the acive summons for this server.

title: banish
explanation: Kicks a player from your summon.

title: signUpAllUsers
explanation: Admin-exclusive command to forcefully signup every user for a specified game. Works identical to the *signUp* command.

title: removeGameFromAllUsers
explanation: Admin-exclusive command to forcefully remove a game from every user in the server. Works identical to the *removeGame* command

title: signUpSpecificUser
explanation: Admin-exclusive command to forcefully signUp one or more users for a specified game.

title: removeGameFromSpecificUser
explanation: Admin-exclusive command to forcefully remove a game from one or more users for a specified game.

title: currentSong
explanation: Shows the current timestamp of the song out of the total.

title: currentPlaylist
explanation: Shows the current playlist information.

title: searchForUser
explanation: Searches all of the servers' voice channels I know of for a specific user, stalker imo :shrug:

title: flipCoin
explanation: Can't decide between heads or tails? Flip a coin!

title: goTo
explanation: Go to a specific song in the playlist.

title: shuffle
explanation: Shuffles the current playlist

title: repeat
explanation: Sets the repeat mode for songs. One: repeats the current song. All: loops the entire playlist.

title: decider
explanation: Randomly chooses an option out of the ones provided.
example: 1) decider choice A, choice B, choice C

title: roll
explanation: Rolls any number-sided die. Default is 20.

title: setTimer
explanation: Sets a timer that once finished, will send you a message.

title: shakeUser
explanation: Randomly moves a user across voice channels x times, and returns them to the starting channel at start.

title: volume
explanation: Sets the music volume out of 100.

title: setCommand
explanation: Sets a new moniker for an existing command, the original command names will still work. Make sure to seperate the original command and the moniker by a single comma!

title: monikers
explanation: Shows you a list of all your command monikers.

title: removeMoniker
explanation: Removes a specified moniker from your personal list.

title: timeZone
explanation: Converts a specified time to a different timezone. Time is used in 12hour format! Formatted: fromTimeZone, the time, toTimeZone

title: linkTwitch
explanation: Link a twitch account (using just a name) to automatically add any channels you follow for the bot to notify you!

title: unlinkTwitch
explanation: Unlinks a twitch account and optionally all associated follows.

title: viewTwitchFollows
explanation: Shows you a list of all the twitch channels you are following.

title: unfollowTwitchChannel
explanation: Unfollows a specific twitch channel.

title: followTwitchChannel
explanation: Follows a specific twitch channel

title: pairChannelWithTwitch
explanation: Tells the bot to put a notification in the @mentioned channel when the specified twitch streamer goes live!

title: showChannelTwitchPairs
explanation: Shows you the server channel - twitch streamer pairs.

title: removeChannelTwitchPairs
explanation: Removes a serverChannel - twitchStreamer pair.

title: leagueRank
explanation: Shows you your Leage of Legends stats, or the stats of another person. You have to specify the region and their summoner name seperated by a comma! **Default zone is 'na'!**

title: rlRanks
explanation: Shows you your Rocket League ranks, or the ranks of another person. You have to specify the platform and their name seperated by a comma! **Default platform is 'steam'!**. The others are: ps for playstation and xbox for...xbox

title: rlTracker
explanation: Sends a message with a Rocket Leauge elo rating update for a specific player/platofrm in a specified channel.

title: removeRLTracker
explanation: Removes a Rocket League tracker for a player+platform from a specified channel.

title: viewRLTrackers
explanation: Shows all the player+platform(s) that are being tracked (on Rocket League) for the server and the channels in which they are being posted. Updates can take up to **5 minutes**!

title: helpAdmins
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving admin functionalities.

title: helpQualityOfLife
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving quality of life functionalities.

title: helpTutorials
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving tutorial functionalities.

title: helpBugsSuggestions
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving bug/suggestion functionalities.

title: helpTwitch
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving twitch functionalities.

title: helpGeneral
explanation: Shows the list of commands involving general functionalities.

title: introTutorial
explanation: Starts an introductory tutorial for you to learn the very basics of the bot.

title: suggestGame
explanation: Add a game suggestion to the queue which can be found on the official Short Answer Discord Server. If accepted/rejected you will get a notification!

title: officialServerInvite
explanation: Creates an invite link to the official Short Answer discord server!

title: acceptSuggestion
explanation: You should know.

title: createFaction
explanation: Creates a faction for this server which is tied to a role.

title: factionPoints
explanation: Awards or removes points from a faction and/or faction member.

title: viewFaction
explanation: Shows all the information about a specific faction or general overview of all the factions if not specified.

title: deleteFaction
explanation: Deletes a specific @role faction and all the information associated with it.

title: resetFactions
explanation: Resets all the factions points and member contribution to 0.

title: factionNewMemberAlertChannel
explanation: Sets which channel is used to notify when a faction gains a new member!

title: createFactionRunningTally
explanation: Creates/overwrites the live faction tally display!

title: inviteMe
explanation: Creates an invite link to add me to your server!

title: inviteSupportServer
explanation: Creates an invite link to my support server!

title: autoRole
explanation:
Starts the setup for an autorole message! Complete with options such as:
1) Unique: Only 1 reaction per user
2) Static: Prevents other reactions
3) Permenant: Limits a user to a single reaction for the message. They will not be able to change their mind.
And if they remove the reaction, the role will be removed from them as well (unless permenent was enabled)

title: privacyPolicy
explanation: Shows the privacy policy.

title: welcomeMessages
explanation: Turns the welcome messages on or off.

title: commandSuggestions
explanation: Turns the command suggestions (in the case of typos) on or off.

title: helpFirstTime
explanation: Shows the useful commands to check out when it's your first time using the bot.

title: editAutoRoleTitle
explanation: Changes an existing autorole's title (if the bot is the author of the message). Takes 2 parameters: messageID and the new title -> seperated by a comma
example: 1) editAutoRoleTitle 758444217017565244, This Is The New Title

title: editAutoRoleDescription
explanation: Changes an existing autorole's description (if the bot is the author of the message). Takes 2 parameters: messageID and the new description -> seperated by a comma

title: passwordLockRole
explanation: Creates a password that when messages to the bot's DM, will assign that user a specific role. When setting up, the bot will prompt to send the password to the DM to avoid onlookers!

title: activatePasswordRole
explanation: Checks a guild-password combination to see if there is any role associated with the provided password. Must be sent as a Direct Message

title: viewPasswordLockRole
explanation: Admin only command that sends you a list of all the passwords and the ID's of the role's they are linked to. The list will be sent to you Direct Messages. Must be called from a server text channel.

title: deletePasswordLockRole
explanation: Admin only command that deletes a certain password-roleID based on the provided password.

title: setChannelImageThanker
explanation: Thanks users for posting an image in the channel!

title: unSetChannelImageThanker
explanation: Admin only command that unmarks this channel for image (thank) checking.

title: channelThankerMessage
explanation: Admin only command that sets what the thank message should be. Indicate where/if a user should be @mentioned with <>. Inidicate where the message should say image/link/(image and link) with []. Inidicate where the bot should say +x rep! with (). For example, **That's a nice [] you got there <>, ()** would be converted to **That's a nice link you got there @TheLastSpark, +1 rep!

title: repScore
explanation: Shows the rep amount of a user in the server.

title: rep
explanation: Admin only command that gives an @mentioned user the specified amount of rep.

title: removeRep
explanation: Admin only command that takes away an @mentioned user the specified amount of rep.

title: topRep
explanation: Shows a list of the top 10 users by rep. **The user must have at least 1 rep**. Can optionally display a larger amount by providing a number

title: setThankerAutoRep
explanation: Sets the automatic rep gain from the image/link thanker (must be turned on individually)

title: setImageChannel
explanation: Sets this channel to receive forwarded images!

title: unSetImageChannel
explanation: UnSets this channel to receive forwarded images!

title: setImageSourceChannel
explanation: Sets this channel to be scanned for images to be posted elsewhere on the server!

title: unSetImageSourceChannel
explanation: UnSets this channel to be scanned for images to be posted elsewhere on the server!

title: setImageForwarding
explanation: Tells the bot to (or not to) scan for images in all channels and forward them to the channel setup by imageChannel command!

title: setRepRolePair
explanation: Sets an autorole to automatically grant roles based on a threshold rep amount! Calling it on an existing rep-role pair will edit the rep threshold

title: removeRepRolePair
explanation: Removes an autorole from automatically granting a role based on a threshold rep amount!

title: blacklistRepRole
explanation: Add a role to the blacklist, preventing anyone with it from gaining rep!

title: removeBlacklistedRepRole
explanation: Removes a role from the rep blacklist.

title: setCommandChannel
explanation: Whitelists a channel for bot commands. If there is at least one channel whitelisted, the bot will ignore all other channels!

title: unSetCommandChannel
explanation: Removes a channel from the bot command whitelist. If there is at least one channel whitelisted, the bot will ignore all other channels!

title: setMusicRole
explanation: Sets the minimum role for anyone to use the music functionalities!

title: unSetMusicRole
explanation: Removes the minimum role for anyone to use the music functionalities!

title: setChannelLinkThanker
explanation: Admin only command that marks this channel for link checking. When a valid link is posted in the channel the user will be thanked using the thankerMessage (configurable)

title: unSetChannelLinkThanker
explanation: Admin only command that unmarks this channel for link checking.

title: botStats
explanation: Shows various information about the bot!

title: welcomeMessage
explanation: Sets the message to DM to any new members joining the server. If set to **-1**, no message will be sent.
example: 1) welcomeMessage Welcome to Short Answer Bot's server! Please make sure to react in #role-assignment to get access to the right channels!

title: twitchHerePing
explanation: Enables or disables the `@here` ping for twitch notifications in text channels

title: blacklistGiveRepRole
explanation: Add a role to the blacklist, preventing anyone with it from gaining rep!

title: removeBlacklistedGiveRepRole
explanation: Removes a role from the rep blacklist.

title: youtubeChannelPair
explanation: Posts alerts in the specified channel when a youtuber posts a new video.

title: viewYoutubeChannelPairs
explanation: Shows all the youtuber-channel pairs for this server.

title: deleteYoutubeChannelPair
explanation: Deletes a specific youtuber-TextChannel alert pair from this server.

title: followYoutuber
explanation: Sends you a DM whenever the specified youtuber posts a new video.
